tutorial.TUT_STEP_0_ID:
TOUCH THE SCREEN
TO START DRAWING
tutorial.TUT_STEP_2_ID:
MOVE YOUR FINGER
TO DRAW A CIRCLE
tutorial.TUT_STEP_1_ID:
DESTROY AS MANY SQUARES
AS YOU CAN WITH THE CIRCLE
tutorial.TUT_STEP_3_ID:
Here is the number
OF SQUARES YOU HAVE
TO DESTROY TO COMPLETE
THE LEVEL
tutorial.TUT_STEP_4_ID:
IF THIS COUNTER REACHES
100%, YOU LOSE...
